Title: BigPicture™
Description: A sample Silverlight 2.0 beta 1 application utilizing Microsoft's Deep Zoom technology along with Vertigo's Big Picture™ mouse interaction handing code (as seen in the Hard Rock Memorabilia application)
HomeWiki:
What is Vertigo BigPicture™?

Microsoft’s Silverlight Deep Zoom doesn’t give you any mouse wheel support. Vertigo extracted the mouse-handling from their BigPicture™ technology to share with everyone. What you get:
  • Mouse interactions in C# managed code, including mouse wheel support
  • Cross-browser compatible with Firefox 2 and beta 3, IE7, and Safari (both Windows and Mac)
  • Cross-domain support, with support for embedded applications and CDN hosting scenarios
  • Multiple instance support: more than one MultiScaleImage in a page or application supported (with multiple wrapper instances)
  • Correct detection of MultiScaleImage instance boundaries, regardless of Silverlight instance positioning (including tables, margins, etc)
